mapper.select: SELECT A.ASSET , A.KR_NM , B.DC_TYCD , A.CHRG_YN , A.CHRG_ASSET , A.CHRG_COND_AMT , A.CHRG_AMT , DATE_FORMAT(C.WK_DT, '%Y%m%d') AS BEF_WK_DT , C.BEF_AMT AS BEF_BEF_AMT , C.INC_AMT AS BEF_INC_AMT , C.DEC_AMT AS BEF_DEC_AMT , C.AMT AS BEF_AMT , DATE_FORMAT(C.BEF_DT, '%Y%m%d') AS BEF_BEF_DT , DATE_FORMAT(D.WK_DT, '%Y%m%d') AS AFT_WK_DT , D.BEF_AMT AS AFT_BEF_AMT , D.INC_AMT AS AFT_INC_AMT , D.DEC_AMT AS AFT_DEC_AMT , D.AMT AS AFT_AMT , DATE_FORMAT(D.BEF_DT, '%Y%m%d') AS AFT_BEF_DT , DATE_FORMAT(#{WK_DT}, '%Y%m%d') AS WK_DT , #{AMT} AS AMT FROM info_asset A LEFT JOIN info_asset_kind B ON A.ASSET_KIND = B.ASSET_KIND LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM mast_asset WHERE WK_DT = ( SELECT MAX(WK_DT) FROM mast_asset WHERE ASSET = (SELECT CASE WHEN ASSET_KIND='CKC' THEN PAY_ASSET ELSE ASSET END FROM info_asset WHERE ASSET = #{ASSET}) AND WK_DT <= #{WK_DT} ) ) C ON A.ASSET = C.ASSET LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM mast_asset WHERE WK_DT = ( SELECT MIN(WK_DT) FROM mast_asset WHERE ASSET = (SELECT CASE WHEN ASSET_KIND='CKC' THEN PAY_ASSET ELSE ASSET END FROM info_asset WHERE ASSET = #{ASSET}) AND WK_DT > #{WK_DT} ) ) D ON A.ASSET = D.ASSET WHERE 1=1 AND A.ASSET = (SELECT CASE WHEN ASSET_KIND='CKC' THEN PAY_ASSET ELSE ASSET END FROM info_asset WHERE ASSET = #{ASSET})
